backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor defining types (Student, Teacher, Exam, Message, Artwork, AdmissionForm) and implementing student/teacher management, admission workflows, messaging, artwork gallery, and analytics with role-based access control and blob storage.
feature_evidence.json: JSON report mapping implemented features (homepage, admission pages, gallery, WhatsApp button, forms, login, dashboards) to their source files, components, test IDs, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Pre-generated summaries of all frontend TypeScript/React files describing routing, layouts, authentication, pages, hooks, and components for the art academy application.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables for light and dark themes defining colors for UI components, charts, and sidebar elements.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point for the React application with viewport meta tag and root div mounting point.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component configuring TanStack Router with all application routes (public pages, student/teacher dashboards) wrapped in ThemeProvider with toast notifications.
frontend/src/components/analytics/StatsC: Reusable card component displaying a statistic with title, numeric value, icon, and gradient color background.
frontend/src/components/analytics/Studen: Bar chart component using Recharts to visualize student distribution across exam levels with colorful bars and rotated labels.
frontend/src/components/auth/AccessDenie: Full-screen error page with shield icon and message shown when users lack permission to access a route, includes link back to homepage.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Authentication button component handling Internet Identity login/logout with loading states and query cache clearing on logout.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Modal dialog that prompts authenticated users without a profile to enter their name and save it. Prevents closing until profile is created.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProtectedRo: Route wrapper that checks authentication and optionally admin role, showing loading states or access denied screens as needed.
frontend/src/components/common/WhatsAppB: Fixed floating button in bottom-right corner that opens WhatsApp chat with pre-filled message about the art academy.
frontend/src/components/forms/ArtworkUpl: File upload component with preview, progress tracking, and conversion of selected image files to ExternalBlob format for backend upload.
frontend/src/components/gallery/ArtworkC: Card component displaying artwork image, title, and level badge with hover effects and gradient styling.
frontend/src/components/layout/Footer.ts: Footer with academy info, contact details, social media links, and attribution to caffeine.ai with dynamic year and hostname.
frontend/src/components/layout/Header.ts: Navigation header with logo, menu links (Home, Admissions, Gallery, Dashboard), login button, user greeting, and responsive mobile menu.
frontend/src/components/layout/Layout.ts: Root layout component wrapping Header, main content outlet, Footer, WhatsApp button, and profile setup modal with gradient background.
frontend/src/components/student/Homework: Empty state component showing a message that no homework assignments are currently available.
frontend/src/components/student/LiveClas: Empty state component indicating no live class is currently active with video icon and instructional message.
frontend/src/components/student/Messages: Displays list of messages with content and date, or shows empty state if no messages exist.
frontend/src/components/teacher/ArtworkU: Form for teachers to upload student artwork with fields for title, student selection, level, public visibility toggle, and image upload with validation.
frontend/src/components/teacher/MessageC: A form component that allows teachers to compose and send messages to all students, with a textarea input and submit button that shows loading state during message sending.
frontend/src/components/teacher/PromoteS: A modal dialog component for promoting a student to a new exam level, displaying current level and providing a dropdown to select from available exam levels (Adhya, Madhya, Purna, Year1-8).
frontend/src/components/teacher/StudentC: A card component displaying student information including name, level, guardian, exam count, and a promote button that opens the PromoteStudentModal.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: A React Query hook that manages the backend actor instance, creating it with authentication identity and initializing access control, while invalidating dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context and hooks for managing user login/logout state, identity delegation, and auth client lifecycle with configurable options.
frontend/src/hooks/usePromoteStudent.ts: A mutation hook that calls the backend actor to promote a student to a new exam level and invalidates student-related queries on success.
frontend/src/hooks/usePublicGallery.ts: A query hook that fetches public artworks from the backend actor for display in the public gallery.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: An intentionally empty file serving as a placeholder, as queries are organized in separate hook files.
frontend/src/hooks/useSearchStudents.ts: A query hook that searches for students by name using the backend actor, with the search term as a query key parameter.
frontend/src/hooks/useSendMessage.ts: A mutation hook that sends a message through the backend actor and invalidates student queries on success.
frontend/src/hooks/useStudentData.ts: A query hook that fetches a single student's data by ID from the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useSubmitAdmission.ts: A mutation hook for submitting admission forms with student name, guardian name, exam level, and artwork blob to the backend.
frontend/src/hooks/useUploadArtwork.ts: A mutation hook for uploading artwork with title, artist ID, level, visibility flag, and image blob, invalidating public artworks query on success.
frontend/src/hooks/useUserProfile.ts: Provides query and mutation hooks for fetching and saving the current user's profile data through the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useUserRole.ts: A query hook that fetches the current user's role from the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables defining a vibrant, child-friendly color scheme for light and dark modes, including primary (orange), secondary (pink), accent (purple), and chart colors.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React Query client, Internet Identity provider, and renders the root App component.
frontend/src/pages/AdmissionFormPage.tsx: Admission application form page that collects student/guardian info, exam level, and artwork upload; shows success confirmation with application ID after submission.
frontend/src/pages/AdmissionInfoPage.tsx: Public informational page explaining the admission process (4 steps), exam level system (11 levels from Adhya to 8th Year), and requirements for applying.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Landing page with hero section, feature cards highlighting academy benefits (expert teachers, small classes, certified programs), and call-to-action buttons for applying and viewing gallery.
frontend/src/pages/PublicGalleryPage.tsx: Public gallery page displaying student artworks in a grid layout with loading and empty states.
frontend/src/pages/StudentDashboard.tsx: Protected student dashboard showing profile info, current level badge, and panels for messages, homework, and live class embed.
frontend/src/pages/TeacherAdmissionsPage: Protected teacher page for reviewing pending admission applications (placeholder UI indicating functionality coming soon).
Protected teacher analytics dashboard displaying student statistics, level distribution, and charts for enrollment insights.
frontend/src/pages/TeacherDashboard.tsx: Teacher dashboard landing page with a grid of navigation cards linking to student management, admissions, messages, resources, live streaming, gallery, and analytics sections. Protected by admin-only route guard.
frontend/src/pages/TeacherGalleryManagem: Teacher page for uploading and managing student artwork to the public gallery. Contains the ArtworkUploadForm component within a protected admin route.
frontend/src/pages/TeacherLiveStreamPage: Placeholder page for future live streaming functionality where teachers will broadcast art classes. Currently shows a coming-soon message within a protected route.
frontend/src/pages/TeacherMessagesPage.t: Teacher page for composing and sending messages/homework to students. Contains the MessageComposer component within a protected admin route.
Placeholder page for future teaching resource uploads (reference paintings, demos, guides). Currently shows a coming-soon message within a protected route.
frontend/src/pages/TeacherStudentManagem: Teacher page displaying all enrolled students with search functionality. Uses useSearchStudents hook and renders StudentCard components for each student within a protected admin route.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for extracting, storing, and managing URL parameters from both query strings and hash-based routing, with sessionStorage persistence support. Includes functions to clear sensitive parameters from URLs.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom color scheme using OKLCH color space, extended border radius, shadows, animations, and typography/container plugins for the art academy UI design system.
project_state.json: Project metadata defining the digital art academy platform architecture with multi-role system, MongoDB backend, 13-level exam progression, live streaming, and mobile-first design. Lists completed features and required image assets.
